about-me1: Hey, I'm Muhammed. I'm a frontend developer from Hamburg, Germany. Welcome to my portfolio, which I have programmed using Angular. I love programming, and it brings me immense joy. I am eager to convince you of my skills.
about-me2: My expertise with the most relevant tech stack for front-end development makes me a competent developer. With experience and enthusiasm, I am equipped to handle challenging projects.
about-me3: I have completed an intensive full-time course, where I learned a great deal through numerous hands-on projects. You can find these projects showcased here on my portfolio.
my-skills1: Through continuous learning, I have enhanced my front-end development skills, resulting in the creation of several practical projects.
portfolio-p: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
project1-span: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project2-span: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
project3-span: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
contact-span1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact-span2: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
contactform-span4: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
imprint-p1: This website is privately operated and serves non-commercial purposes.
imprint-p2: All content on this website, including texts, images, and graphics, is protected by copyright.
imprint-p3: We do not assume any liability for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
imprint-p4: These details are required according to § 5 TMG (Telemedia Act) and § 55 RStV (Interstate Broadcasting Agreement).
privacy-policy-headline2: Welcome to my portfolio! Your privacy is important to me. This privacy policy explains how I collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit my portfolio or use my services.
privacy-policy-p1: Controller within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
privacy-policy-p2: I collect personal data that you voluntarily provide, for example, when you fill out the contact form. This data may include your name, email address, and other information necessary to provide my services.
privacy-policy-p3: I use your personal data exclusively to effectively process your inquiries and to provide you with the requested services. This includes direct communication about my projects and services to ensure that your needs are met as effectively as possible.
privacy-policy-p4: - Inventory data (e.g., names, addresses). - Contact details (e.g., email).
privacy-policy-p5: - Answering inquiries and communicating with users.
privacy-policy-p6: Article 6 (1) lit. b GDPR serves as the legal basis for processing operations to fulfill a contract or pre-contractual measures.
privacy-policy-p7: I implement appropriate technical and organizational measures in accordance with Article 32 GDPR to ensure a level of protection appropriate to the risk.
privacy-policy-p8: You have the right to request confirmation as to whether the data in question is being processed, and to access this data, as well as additional information and copies of the data.
privacy-policy-p9: You have the right to withdraw consent granted under Art. 7 (3) GDPR with future effect.
privacy-policy-p10: You can object to future processing of your personal data in accordance with Art. 21 GDPR at any time.
privacy-policy-h2-11: 11. Cookies and Right to Object to Direct Advertising
privacy-policy-p11: I do not use cookies and do not collect automatic data except for the information you provide me through the contact form.
privacy-policy-p12: The data processed by me will be deleted as soon as they are no longer required for their intended purpose and there are no legal retention obligations preventing deletion.
privacy-policy-p13: I reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to comply with changes in legal requirements or changes to my services. I will inform you about significant changes.
privacy-policy-p14: If you have any questions about the privacy policy, please feel free to contact me directly.
